item.title: Mentioned by Terrace Standard
item.description:
MP Nathan Cullen silent about his wages
This board has seven members: four Conservatives, two New Democrats (including Nathan Cullen, my MP), and one Liberal. The agenda ... For the record, Mr. Cullen earns $160,200 a year as a Member of Parliament plus $$39,800 as NDP house leader.

item.title: Mentioned by Queen Charlotte Islands Observer
item.description:
Question & Answer with Nathan Cullen
Skeena-Bulkley Valley MP Nathan Cullen was on the islands recently, meeting with councils, talking with residents and enjoying himself at Skidegate Days and the pole moving. We caught up with him on a Saturday afternoon to get an update on his activities ...

item.title: Mentioned by CFTKTV
item.description:
MP Nathan Cullen Calls On Feds To Aid In Skeena Sockeye Crisis
Skeena-Bulkley Valley MP Nathan Cullen is calling on the federal government and the Pacific Salmon Commision to find a better way of monitoring US overtake of local sockeye population. This comes after three BC conservation groups accused Alaskan ...
